statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_sales_data ORDER BY social_media_id DESC;
SELECT social_media_handle, sales_amount FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
SELECT campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE social_media_id = 3;
SELECT social_media_id, social_media_handle, campaign_name FROM social_media_sales_data ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT social_media_handle, sales_amount FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT social_media_handle, campaign_name FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE social_media_handle = 'Instagram' ORDER BY campaign_start_date ASC
SELECT social_media_handle, campaign_name FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%holiday%'
SELECT social_media_handle, AVG(sales_amount) as average_sales FROM social_media_sales_data GROUP BY social_media_handle HAVING AVG(sales_amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_date, post_content FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%happy%';
SELECT id, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, post_date FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE marketing_budget > 50000;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, marketing_budget, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > shares_count * 2;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data
SELECT post_author, post_date, post_likes FROM social_media_data
SELECT post_content, post_author, post_likes FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT post_author, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, purchases, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE revenue > 5000.00 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT post_author, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_data GROUP BY post_author HAVING total_posts > 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, campaign_budget FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_budget ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_messages JOIN social_media_campaigns ON social_media_messages.campaign_id = social_media_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE message_likes > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_text, message_date FROM social_media_messages WHERE message_likes > 100 ORDER BY message_shares DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT product_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM sales_data WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, ci.interaction_type, ci.interaction_date FROM customer_data c JOIN customer_interactions ci ON c.customer_id = ci.customer_id WHERE ci.interaction_date <= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY;
